headline.print_headline: Egypt's Parliament Endorses Controversial Anti-Terrorism Law
headline.main: Egypt's Parliament Endorses Controversial Anti-Terrorism Law

snippet: Egypt's parliament on Sunday overwhelmingly endorsed a controversial anti-terrorism law that sets up special courts and shields its enforcers from legal ramifications....
lead_paragraph: Egypt's parliament on Sunday overwhelmingly endorsed a controversial anti-terrorism law that sets up special courts and shields its enforcers from legal ramifications.

headline.print_headline: Kerry: Climate Change as Dangerous as Terrorism
headline.main: Kerry: Climate Change as Dangerous as Terrorism

snippet: U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry said Friday that climate change is as dangerous as, if not more, than the threats posed by the Islamic State and other extremist groups....
lead_paragraph: U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry said Friday that climate change is as dangerous as, if not more, than the threats posed by the Islamic State and other extremist groups.

headline.print_headline: Spain: Court Drops Terrorism Probe Against Puppeteers
headline.main: Spain: Court Drops Terrorism Probe Against Puppeteers

snippet: Spain's National Court judge has shelved an investigation into two puppeteers for allegedly praising terrorism in a theater show....
lead_paragraph: Spain's National Court judge has shelved an investigation into two puppeteers for allegedly praising terrorism in a theater show.

headline.print_headline: German Cabinet Approves New Anti-Terrorism Measures
headline.main: German Cabinet Approves New Anti-Terrorism Measures

snippet: Germany's interior minister says Chancellor Angela Merkel's Cabinet has approved a package of new measures to help fight terrorism....
lead_paragraph: Germany's interior minister says Chancellor Angela Merkel's Cabinet has approved a package of new measures to help fight terrorism.

headline.print_headline: French Prosecutor Announces Longer Terrorism Sentences
headline.main: French Prosecutor Announces Longer Terrorism Sentences

snippet: The Paris prosecutor has announced harsher prison sentences for returning French jihadis, saying the country faces an increased risk of attacks as the Islamic State group weakens in Iraq and Syria....
lead_paragraph: The Paris prosecutor has announced harsher prison sentences for returning French jihadis, saying the country faces an increased risk of attacks as the Islamic State group weakens in Iraq and Syria.

snippet: A Singaporean man has been detained for "terrorism-related activities" that included supporting the Islamic State (IS) militant group and encouraging violence through Facebook posts, the government said on Friday....
lead_paragraph: A Singaporean man has been detained for "terrorism-related activities" that included supporting the Islamic State (IS) militant group and encouraging violence through Facebook posts, the government said on Friday.

snippet: The Russian and Israeli leaders have declared themselves partners in a battle against global terrorism....
lead_paragraph: The Russian and Israeli leaders have declared themselves partners in a battle against global terrorism.

headline.print_headline: Reports: Authorities Feared Terrorism, Explosives at Pulse
headline.main: Reports: Authorities Feared Terrorism, Explosives at Pulse

snippet: Law enforcement officials immediately suspected terrorism and adjusted their staging areas due to fears about an explosive device as they responded to reports of shots fired at a gay nightclub in Orlando, according to sheriff's office incident rep...
lead_paragraph: Law enforcement officials immediately suspected terrorism and adjusted their staging areas due to fears about an explosive device as they responded to reports of shots fired at a gay nightclub in Orlando, according to sheriff's office incident reports released Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Belgian Prosecutors Charge Three Men With Terrorism
headline.main: Belgian Prosecutors Charge Three Men With Terrorism

snippet: Belgian federal prosecutors on Saturday said they had charged three men, including a suspect Belgian media believe is a man captured on security footage with two suicide bombers at Brussels airport on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Belgian federal prosecutors on Saturday said they had charged three men, including a suspect Belgian media believe is a man captured on security footage with two suicide bombers at Brussels airport on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Prosecutors Say British Housing Benefits Funded Terrorism
headline.main: Prosecutors Say British Housing Benefits Funded Terrorism

snippet: Prosecutors say two British men accused of providing cash to a key figure in the mass terror attacks in Brussels and Paris used a bank account that included government money from excess housing benefits....
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors say two British men accused of providing cash to a key figure in the mass terror attacks in Brussels and Paris used a bank account that included government money from excess housing benefits.
